name: Glamour – Visual CSS Styling Plugin
author: CantoThemes

sections.description:
The most powerful and advance visual styling plugin. This plugin gives you to customize any page or post design without codding. Click on an element or add a custom selector to start customizing. Change an element color, line height, letter spacing, and more. instantly with live preview. Try It Now

Now, you will be able to change the design of your site without changing the theme. Glamour provides full control over the design of your site.

Key Features

  • Design every element on Page/Post
  • Design header, footer, widgets or any content
  • Auto and manual both selector available
  • 70+ CSS Properties (more coming)
  • Visual drag and drop position (Pro)
  • Visual resizeable padding (Pro) and margin
  • 850+ Google fonts (Pro)
  • Gradient Background (Pro)
  • Live Preview
  • Responsive design for the small laptop, tablet and mobile phone
  • Style element state hover, active and focus
  • Custom color presets (Pro)

CSS Properties

All CSS properties available in this plugin.

Typography

  • Color
  • Font Family (Pro)
  • Font Weight (Pro)
  • Font Size (Pro)
  • Line Height
  • Letter Spacing
  • Word Spacing
  • Font Style
  • Text Align (Pro)
  • Text Transform
  • Text Decoration
  • Text Indent
  • Text Shadow (Pro)
  • Vertical Align
  • Text Overflow
  • Word Wrap
  • White Space

Background

  • Background Color (Pro)
  • Background Image (Pro)
  • Background Position
  • Background Repeat
  • Background Size
  • Background Attachment
  • Background Clip

Layout

  • Width
  • Height
  • Padding (Pro)
  • Margin
  • Maximum Width
  • Maximum Height
  • Minimum Width
  • Minimum Height
  • Box Sizing

Position

  • Position
  • Top
  • Bottom
  • Left
  • Right
  • zIndex

Extra

  • Opacity
  • Display
  • Float
  • Clear
  • Visibility
  • Pointer Events
  • Overflow
  • Overflow X
  • Overflow Y
  • Cursor

Box Shadow (Pro)

Add one or more shadow to an element with our visual box shadow editor.

Transform (Pro)

Scale, rotate and move an element with CSS transform visual editor.

Transition (Pro)

Add transition to an element for making a nice animation at state changes.

Filter (Pro)

Change visual effect to an element especially an image.

Free vs Pro

The free version has some limited features like the background, gradient background, google fonts, box shadow, transform, etc. To unlock these features you can purchase pro version.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire glamour folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Can I change the content of my website?

No, It’s just a visual CSS editor. to edit content try Page Builder Plugin.
